User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://martiixx.github.io/sitemap-index.xml

# Disallow admin or private areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /blog/
Allow: /projects/
Allow: /about/
Allow: /contact/

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
